meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of sucrose to glucose and fructose.
meanings.sent1: The sucrases in our bodies help break down sugar into simpler forms for energy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study sucrases to understand how sugars are processed in living organisms.
meanings.sent3: The sucrases at the sugar factory were working hard to convert sucrose into glucose.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of sucrases was as sharp as a knife slicing through sugar molecules.
meanings.sent5: The classroom demonstration vividly showed how sucrases transform sucrose into glucose and fructose.
